title: NHAI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 General Manager Posts
description: National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 General Manager Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., MCA can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the NHAI Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of applicati...
